lines.text: [Music]
Last time on Trebuchet Village, the heroes came face to face with Connoria, the warlock who served
The Jester and his nasty changeling familiar Impy. After nearly killing Patrick Yodar,
Sullivan's string of good luck and Dogen's decisive blow took out Conneria and granted the gang the
Yoni Egg of Yore. After raiding his hovel, finding a strange substance that the gang made Sullivan
drink, our heroes headed back towards the White Woman of the Woods to give her the Yoni Egg of
Basket. But not before The Jester attempted to make a deal with them. He'd gift them a magical
staff that had happy faces and frowny faces, much to evil Stievel's chagrin, and freedom
from the woods if they handed him the yoni egg of Baskin.
They, in my opinion, confusingly refused his offer, and instead handed the egg to the white
woman, who proceeded to do what you do with such a thing.
Her magical yeast infection spread throughout the Whippet Woods, which became more normal,
with squirrels and birds and little flowers and nice trees, nothing laughing or cackling
or being weird and dark crystal-y.
The crew stayed the night, morning, and a bit of the afternoon in her conch shell home in
the lake before she tossed them out and sent them to take care of the kitsunes once and
for all.
Arriving at the scene, they saw a massive tent made of terrible multicolored detritus,
organic or otherwise, looking like a freaky circus tent, with a massive foxhole underneath.
In the tent they saw the massive beast that belonged to the Vegas brothers, Dean and Luca,
saw that it was a massive Sasquatchian thing indeed, except its head and face were that
of a human clown. They saw him farting and pranking the Vegas brothers who were tied
up at the center of the tent. Also, the beloved Kubler elves were shackled and plodding along,
sad little slaves to the horrid kitsune's designs. Rather than remaining hidden, Patrick
Jodar fired an arrow at the tent for some reason, but it was enough to begin combat
and earnest. With the white woman of the woods power restored,
animal friends came to the aid of our heroes and set upon the
Kitsunes. The leader of the Kitsunes, Bussy Kitsune, faces
our heroes in combat, while a Sasquatchian clown seems to
ready himself for the eventual showdown between the outsiders
from Trebuchet Village and himself.
